org.mitre.synthea.helpers

Class DefaultRandomNumberGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.synthea.helpers.DefaultRandomNumberGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, RandomNumberGenerator

    public class DefaultRandomNumberGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements RandomNumberGenerator, java.io.Serializable
    A default implementation of the RandomNumberGenerator interface. The goal is to isolate sources of randomness by consolidating the use of java.util.Random or other sources of randomness for traceability.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      DefaultRandomNumberGenerator(long seed)
      Create a new default random number generator.
